dialogue.String: 1�Insigni-aficant flea, prepare to hear the ro-oar of Gu'Zho Thunderblade!!!
1�Let me intro-oduce myself. My name is Gu'Zho--officer in the 7th Waughroon Armored Divi-ision of the Quadav Shieldwa-arriors, or should I say fo-ormer officer... I'm what you'd call a de-eserter.

1�I'm not proud of it, but I did wha-at I had to do.Day after da-ay, I watched as hundreds of my troops would be slaughte-ered by the waves of adventurers pouring through the mi-ine shafts in search of their pre-ecious mythril. Why didn't the Adamantking try to ma-ake peace with the chi-ildren of Altana? What twisted se-ense of pride made him so stubborn?

1�I was ti-ired of being a pawn for a leader whose ideals confli-icted with mine. So, I ga-athered up a handful of my best troops and le-eft the Shieldwarriors behind me. Howe-ever, it was not long before the guilt and pressure of being wanted me-en bore down on the already weakened souls of my comra-ades.

1�And one by one they le-eft my side and returned to the mi-ines, until I was left here alone.But what can a Quadav who has known no-othing but the battlefield do when there is no battle for him le-eft to fight?
1�That's why I ca-ame here to Modalpolas. I heard that the Moblies are always lo-ooking for new mercenaries to fill out their ra-anks.
1�I paid a Gobly scribe a sackful of mythri-il ore to write me a recommenda-ation. Now all I have to do is take it to the applica-ation box located somewhere in this mess of scaffolding and ro-ock.
1�You wouldn't happen to know your way around this pla-ace, would you?
1�Your grade in Movalpolos geography:A+.F-.
1�Don't worry about it. I'm not tha-at good with directions either... I'll just wait he-ere a little longer until someone with a ma-ap comes along.
1�You don't say! Well, then I have a pro-oposition for you.
1�You see, as you already may kno-ow, we Quadav don't have that good eyesi-ight; we mainly rely on our hearing and a set of se-ensory organs that pre-event us from getting lost.

1�However, the magne-etic field created by all this crazy Mobly equipme-ent has been sending my sense of direction haywire. I've tried naviga-ating the tunnels here, but I always end up ba-ack in the same spot...

1�And that's why I need your he-elp. If you can really traverse the Mobly tu-unnels as well as you say you can, you should have no trouble in deli-ivering my recommendation to the application bo-ox.
1�What do you say? Will you help?Of course!On second thought...
1�Hm...Maybe I should have me-entioned I was willing to pay in gold be-efore I asked...
1�You will!? I don't know how to tha-ank you!How about gold? I heard it is quite va-aluable in your world as well.
1�Wait...We're not he-eading into Mobalpolus to pick any fi-ights with the Moblies.
1�If you wa-alked in looking like that, there might be more unwanted bloodshe-ed...and that's the last thing I need any mo-ore of on my conscience.

1�What you need is a di-isguise...What if you were to make one of those stra-ange masks that those Moblies are always we-earing? There must be a few softbacks in one of your towns that spe-ecializes in leathercraft...
1�I don't know if I can tru-ust your type, but then I don't know if I can tru-ust anybody right now.I'll be waiting here for you, adve-enturer...
1�Grawhawhawh! I tho-ought for a minute there that you were one of those pe-esky Gobly scouts!
1�That's one heck of a di-isguise you managed to put together! I can't see you that well, but from what I can make out, you shouldn't have any trouble ma-aking your way into the mi-ines!
1�Here, take my recommenda-ation and take it to the applica-ation box.Where is it? How should I know? I barely even know whe-ere here is!

1�After you place the le-etter in the box, it won't be long before one of their merce-enary serjeants will come out to collect it. When he does, lead him ba-ack here, and I'll give you your rewa-ard.
1�...No fun...Nothing around but rocks...I want to see pretty things... Crazy things...
1�I'm Tarnotik.
1�Hm?You �[guy/lady] that want to go deep into Movalpolos? You crazy. Crazier than Tarnotik.
1�But I like crazies.I take you, but first you give me goodie.
1�I want crazy goodie.I want flower that grows in snow. That's crazy!
1�You give me crazy flower and I take you to Shaft 2716.
1�But that's as far as Tarnotik go. Shaft 2716 is bad place. Even crazy Tarnotik not go in there.
1�Tarnotik happy!
1�Tarnotik like crazy adventurer!
1�Moblins no break promises! Tarnotik take you to Shaft 2716 now.
1�Every day fun for Tarnotik!I loves my crazy goodies!I loves my crazy adventurer friend!
1�You look for Jabbos, no?I sees Jabbos in Shaft 2716!
1�He no crazy. He say he want to be alone.He lock door so he can be alone. Crazy adventurer find  $����, crazy adventurer can maybe open door.
1�You give me crazy flower and I take you to Shaft 2716.
1�But that's as far as Tarnotik go. Shaft 2716 is bad place. Even crazy Tarnotik not go in there.
1�Hey! Hey! Hey!Crazy adventurer holding crazy lever!Crazy adventurer not supposed to have crazy lever!
1�You use crazy lever, you break door!You break door, Tarnotik can't get inside!
1�How about we make deal? We make crazy deal!You give me crazy lever, I help you out.
1�Give him the 3����?Yes.No.
1�Oh! Crazy adventurer smarter than looks!Tarnotik help you out!
1�Crazy adventurer saying crazy things!Tarnotik no help no one crazier than he!
1�Why, if it isn't the adventurer,  .
1�I must commend you on your insight.
1�Yes, it was nearly one hundred years ago, too, that the Moblins wandered their way up from the bowels of Vana'diel...
1�And then the Tarutaru scientist who examined the statue in Tavnazia--what he said about the statue dug up from a labyrinth...
1�I advise you, do not let down your guard when traveling through these caves. The Moblins' behavior is often erratic, and they can be quite nastier than their cousins on the surface.
1�Out of all the beastmen, they seem to realize that they are the children of the Twilight, and it is this fact that drives them.
1�Ah yes, one of my colleagues said he spoke with a creature known as Tarnotik deep in the eastern end of this area the Moblins call Oldton Movalpolos. Whether that beast will help you or not...
1�I still am not convinced that this cave is truly the path to Al'Taieu.
1�It cannot be!
1�This's all your fault.
1�It's all your fault.
4�He'll love %����, you said.
1��%���� are better, you said.
1�This's all your fault.
1�It's all your fault.
1�Get some %����, you said.
1��%���� won't work, you said.

1�Hee, Goblin?Sure.Not so much.
1�Dahha!Dahhaan!
1�Auha, dhin.Gaevhoaa, ouwajhu.
1�He's gettin' suspicious.Wants to know why ya don't speak Goblin.
1�This magic makes a Goblin all person. Makes 'em stupid.
1�Then Tarnotik speak different for crazy Goblin.Take crazy Goblins where they want to go.
1�You talk people talk?
1�Tarnotik learn crazy people speak.Learn the language of Promathia.
1�Who taught ya?
1�Forget that! First bring crazy #����!
1�There's a crazy celebration now.The reincarnation of Promathia has come.
1�Promathia was reborn?
1�Tarnotik take you to meet Promathia, but this crazy Goblin get killed in there wearing people face.
1�Tarnotik not sure if he should really send you deep into Movalpolos with crazy warp magic.
1�You really wanna go?I'm crazy enough!Maybe not...
1�Tarnotik has seen those crazy big eye guys that fly around out there. They cry crazy tears. Pretty, sparkly tears.
1�Drippy, pretty, sparkly, crazy tears.You bring one to Tarnotik, and Tarnotik send you deep into Movalpolos, to Shaft 2716.
1�You scared?Maybe you don't got the guts for this.
1�We're goin'. See you in Mine Shaft 2716.
1�Oops, we don't got your tear.Give the Moblin a tear from one of those big eye guys.He'll send you to Mine Shaft 2716.
1�Tarnotik has seen those crazy big eye guys that fly around out there. They cry crazy tears. Pretty, sparkly tears.
1�Drippy, pretty, sparkly, crazy tears.You bring one to Tarnotik, and Tarnotik send you deep into Movalpolos, to Shaft 2716.
1�Tarnotik happy!

1�You...should leave...now...and not...turn back...That...would be...for the...best.
1�Listen...to me...Do not...tell...anyone...what...you saw...here...

1�That...3����...very...dangerous...here.Me...take...

1�My little brother has come back!Zeelozok, welcome home!

1�Trial: Defeat a set number of  [experience-yielding monsters/monsters] under the prescribed conditions.
1�Zeelozok! That's a brilliant plan!
1�My brother has grown wise on his travels!
1�Sis, I'm going to Castle Zvahl to find the Divinity of Darkness.
1�Hold on, hold on. You need to study up on the demons first.Those guys are scary smart.
1�Leave that to me. All I need is  $����, and then I'll know everything there is to know about the Kindred.
1�You!Go to Castle Zvahl and bring back  $����!
1�And be quick, 'cause once Zeelozok makes up his mind, he plunges right in.Go on, scoot!
1�Now that I have this, the demons have nowhere to hide.I can tell what they're thinking, and what they're doing.

1�Hrm.I can't wait for your translation.I'm going on ahead.
1�Going by yourself is only gonna get you killed!You should take everyone with you, including me!
1�None of the other Moblins believe in what I'm doing.They think it's enough for them alone to be Promathia's children.
1�But this is no good.All the beastmen are the children of Promathia.We all must be ready to greet him when he is reborn.
1�I'll write you a letter.I want you to share it with everyone in Movalpolos so they start to think more.
1�You stay here and wait for my letter.
1�My brother is one hell of a Moblin.
1�Hmmm.There must be something I can do to help him...
1�I know, I can work on the translation of that demon script.That could come in handy.
1�This was my brother's...
1�No Moblin would willingly give up their earplug...
1�If Zeelozok no longer has this, then he won't be coming home...
1�Oh!My precious little brother!My stupendous, adorable Zeelozok!
1�Zeelozok!?
1�You made it back!?How did you find the entrance to the warp cavern without your earplug?
1�I didn't.Without the earplug, there was nothing to do but walk.
1�I wrote lots of letters while I was walking, so that even if I collapsed my thoughts would remain on paper.
1�Some Goblins found me wandering and offered to help.
1�They brought me all the way here to Movalpolos.
1�Those Goblins will be blessed by the Twilight God!
1�Oh yeah, they also told me something important.
1�The Divinity of Darkness is searching for a statue beneath the earth.
1�A statue beneath the earth!The statue of legend?The statue that will bring about the age of Moblins!?
1�The dark god must be afraid of its power!We have to find it first!
1�You're right! I'm going to help search right now!Later, Sis!
1�You look confused,  .
1�The warp caverns are open areas left in the tunnels we collapse behind us.They're all linked together like one big chain.
1�With a Moblin earplug, you can find the entrances to the warp caverns.Makes traveling easy. Only we Moblins know they exist.
1�We're gonna start digging out from those caverns again, and search for the statue.You people are no good at digging, so you don't have to help.
1�Take this.When Moblins and demons go to war, use it for the glory of the children of Promathia!
1�Take this.When Moblins and people go to war, use it for the glory of the children of Promathia.
1�I'll be looking for you when the battle starts, so don't go dying yet, okay?
l.�This place being for garbage.No fires. No bombs.
1�Stupid people.You don't getting what I'm saying.
1�How do you respond?Huh?I getting you.
1�Do you really getting me?Okay. Killing bombs. Bringing %����.
1�Five is being too many.No more than four. Can't having fires around here.
1�Killing bombs.Bringing %����.
1�Five is being too many.No more than four. Can't having fires around here.
1�You bringing it!This being perfect! You not being so stupid after all.
1�Now what?You wanting something from me?I guess I should giving you a reward.
1�You can having this.Looking like garbage, but it being important to us Moblins.
1�Take it?I'll take it.No thanks.
1�Stupid people.You already having one.You don't needing two of the same thing.
1�Good, good.You being smart. Very, very clever.
1�...You figuring it out?
1�Okay, okay. Don't being mad.You can having my treasure.It being very shiny. Very pretty.
1�Stupid people.You already having one.You don't needing two of the same thing.
1�Back off!
1�No mail! No mail!My brother is missing!
1�Zeelozok always sends me letters!Always!
1�Zeelozok is on a pilgrimage to teach the other beastmen about Promathia's  [statue/reincarnation].
1�Promathia has been reborn.Zeelozok went first to Davoi to enlighten the Orcs.
1�He went to Davoi first to talk to the Orcs, followers of the Kindred.My brother will teach them that the Divinity of Darkness who the Kindred worship is a false idol.
1�Something must've happened in Davoi.I want to go and find my brother, but I can't leave Movalpolos right now.
1�Something must've happened in Davoi.I want to go and find my brother, but I don't know how to get there.
1�That's why you're going in my place.If you're a child of Promathia like you say, you'll do what I'll tell you!
1�That's why you're going in my place.If you fear Promathia, you'll do as the Moblins say.
1�Do as she asks?Your will is my command!Not gonna happen.
1�That's the way it should be.Now go and find Zeelozok.He said he was going to Davoi to see the Orcs.
1�Promathia will be reborn and mash your people into oblivion!
1�Are you afraid of Promathia?Terrified.Not particularly...
1�That's the way it should be.Now go and find Zeelozok.He said he was going to Davoi to see the Orcs.
1�Promathia will be reborn and mash your people into oblivion!
1�No mail! No mail!My brother is missing!
1�Zeelozok always sends me letters!Always!
1�Zeelozok said he was going to see the Orcs in Davoi.Go and find my brother!
1�A letter!This is a letter from my brother!
1�He got in to talk to the overlord, but the Orcs were too stupid to understand what he was saying.
1�Zeelozok writes that the Orcs only follow the strong. The demon army of the Kindred crushed the Orcs, so the Orcs obey the demons.
1�Then Zeelozok was taken captive.The Orcs said that people and Moblins are only good for eating.
1�My brother is really good at digging, though.He dug a tunnel straight out of Davoi and escaped.
1�But he was mighty mad by now, and said he let all the other ��food�� go free as well.
1�He got something from them as thanks.We don't need this stuff, so you can have it.
1�You're pretty useful for a person!Keep up the good work and show your obedience to the Moblins, and to Promathia!
1�I got another letter from my brother.He says that he's visiting the Yagudo next.
1�The Yagudo say that their god lives among them.Maybe their god is the reincarnation of Promathia!
1�The Yagudo say that their god lives among them.Maybe their god is the same reincarnation of Promathia that appeared to us!
1�Zeelozok went to Castle Oztroja to see for himself.
1�The Yagudo wouldn't let him meet with their god, so instead he found someone who's seen their divinity close up.
1�Zeelozok found a Yagudo who was injured while protecting the bird people's deity.
1�He wants someone to bring him  $����, but I don't know where to get one of those.
1�If you find some, take it to Zeelozok in the bird men's fortress.
1�Do as she asks?I've come this far...Not this time.
1�Find  $���� and take it to Castle Oztroja!
1�Promathia will be reborn and mash your people into oblivion!
1�My brother wants  $���� for the Yagudo who was injured protecting the bird men's deity.
1�Find  $���� and take it to Castle Oztroja!
1�You took your time getting back.I got another letter from Zeelozok that explains what happened.
1�Before the injured Yagudo died, he told Zeelozok about his god.
1�The Yagudo divinity has nothing to do with Promathia.
1�And since the Kindred stole the sacred vessel of their god, the Yagudo have no choice but to obey them.
1�Zeelozok said the Moblins follow the true god.After hearing this, the Yagudo chased him out of Oztroja!
1�Now Zeelozok is in Beadeaux, talking with the Quadav.
1�Here's a surprise!He says that the Quadav are far smarter than he expected!
1�They knew that the Moblins had found a big sparkly crystal and were really impressed!
1�They said that they would help the Moblins to destroy Bastok.
1�But first they want to see proof that the big sparkly crystal really exists.Aw, come on!
1�Well, fair's fair, I suppose.Here, take this 3���� to the Quadav near the smoking kilns.
1�Beadeaux is not that far from here, right?Do your job right and maybe Promathia will forgive your trangressions.
1�Beadeaux is not that far from here, right?Do your job right and I'll put a good word in for you when Promathia comes to destroy all the children of Altana.
1�Help out again?Hail Promathia!I've had enough.
1�Say whatever you want.You can't defy the will of Promathia.
1�Right, then.Go to the smoking kilns in Beadeaux.The Quadav will be waiting for you.
1�Right, then.Go to the smoking kilns in Beadeaux.The Quadav will be waiting for you.
1�The mail's in.My brother writes that the Quadav deceived the Moblins.
1�They gave proof of the big sparkly crystal straight to the Kindred.The Moblins were betrayed to improve the standing of the Quadav.
1�I just don't get it.Why don't any of them understand that the Moblins are right?
1�When Zeelozok gets back, I'm going with him on his next trip.
1�You've made yourself useful, so you can come along, too.Take this with you.
1�Just hold on to it.Are you people really children of the Twilight God?You gotta try harder to get along with your Moblin brothers.
1�Just hold on to it.Promathia loathes the children of the Dawn Goddess.You people have gotta try harder to get into the Twilight God's good books.
1�Just hold on to it.Are you people really children of the Twilight God?You gotta try harder to get along with your Moblin brothers.
1�Just hold on to it.Promathia loathes the children of the Dawn Goddess.You people have gotta try harder to get into the Twilight God's good books.
1�You!Go to Castle Zvahl and bring back  $����!
1�And be quick, 'cause once Zeelozok makes up his mind, he plunges right in.Go on, scoot!
1�I know, I can work on the translation of that demon script.That could come in handy.
1�We're in trouble!The demons are angry at the Moblins!
1�They've found out about Zeelozok's visits to the other beastmen!
1�The Kindred demons are discussing whether or not to obliterate Movalpolos!
1�King Paimon prefers to wait and watch the Moblins before doing anything.
1�But another demon called Marquis Andrealphus is ready to make this city our tomb.
1�If this marquis discovers Zeelozok wandering around Castle Zvahl, Promathia only knows what he'll do to my brother!
1�You have to catch up with Zeelozok!
1�Tell him to stay out of the castle baileys.That's where Marquis Andrealphus can be found.
1�If this marquis discovers Zeelozok wandering around Castle Zvahl, Promathia only knows what he'll do to my brother!
1�Tell him to stay out of the castle baileys.That's where Marquis Andrealphus can be found.
1�The warp caverns are open areas left in the tunnels we collapse behind us.They're all linked together like one big chain.
1�With a Moblin earplug, you can find the entrances to the warp caverns.Makes traveling easy. Only we Moblins know they exist.

1�And vy popular demand, I now aksept %���� az well. Trade me vig onez and you'll earn not only konkwest pointz but good, hard gil to voot!
1�Which service do you request?Buy/Sell items.Teleportation.Nothing.
1�Your nation iz strong in this region. We Movlinz like strong peoplez! I'll sell you my treazurez.
1�Your nation iz friendz with other strong nationz. We Movlinz like strong peoplez! I'll sell you my treazurez.
